channel.title: Asheville|Buncombe County|North Carolina|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Asheville|Buncombe County|North Carolina|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Future I-26 West - Exit 25
item.description: Future I-26 west at Exit 25 - NC-251/University of North Carolina Asheville

item.title: Future I-26/US-19/US-23/US-70 - Hill St. Interchange
item.description: Future I-26/US-19/US-23/US-70 at Hill St. Interchange. Continue on freeway for Weaverville.

item.title: I-240 East/US-70 East at Exits 4A and 4B
item.description: I-240 East/US-70 East at Exits 4A and 4B. Exit 4A (Left) - Future I-26 West/US-19/US-23/US-70 West/UNC Asheville/Weaverville/Woodfin. Exit 4B - Patton Ave./Downtown. Continue ahead for I-240 East/US-70 East/ Expressway. I-26 becomes Future I-26 before this intersection because parts of the highway are not up to interstate standards.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East/Bus. US-19/Bus. US-23 - Asheville
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East/Bus. US-19/Bus. US-23 in Asheville.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Approaching Exit 4A
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East approaching Exit 4A - Future I-26 West/Johnson City (TN).

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Exits 2 and 3A
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East at Exit 2 - Bus. US-19/Bus. US-23/West Asheville. Approaching Exit 3A - US-19 South/US-23 South/Asheville.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Exits 1B and 1C
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East at Exit 1B - NC-191/Brevard Road. Approaching Exit 1C - Amboy Road.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Asheville
item.description: Asheville City Limit on I-26 West/I-240 East.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Exit 1B
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East approaching Exit 1B - NC-191/Brevard Road. The mileposts along the I-26/I-240 overlap in Asheville use the distance from I-240. This is not usual for a primary route to use the mileposts for a loop route. However, I-26 becomes Future I-26 north of I-240.

item.title: I-26 West - Exit 31B
item.description: I-26 west at Exit 31B (Left Exit) - I-40 West/US-74 West/Canton/Knoxville (TN). Continue straight for I-26 West/I-240 East/Asheville.

item.title: I-26 West - Exits 31A and 31B
item.description: I-26 west at Exit 31A - I-40 East/Hickory/Biltmore Estate. Approaching Exit 31B - I-40 West/US-74 West/Knoxville (TN)/Canton. Continue straight for I-26 West/I-240 East/Asheville Downtown/Johnson City (TN). US-74 leaves I-26 westbound and joins I-40 westbound.

item.title: I-26 West - Exit 33
item.description: I-26 west approaching Exit 33 - NC-191/To Blue Ridge Parkway.
